sentences.sContent: You’ll need a spanner to loosen that bolt.
sentences.sCn: 你需要扳手来拧开那个螺栓。

sentences.sContent: ...Everything about the look and feel of a wallet－the way the fastenings and materials wear and tear and loosen with age...

phrases.pCn: 放松肌肉；松弛；[口]信口开河；[口]慷慨解囊

trans.tranOther: to make something less tight or less firmly fastened, or to become less tight or less firmly fastened
